programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village

programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Antonia and Ross love the beautiful island of Ibiza. Having holidayed there many times, they now want their own holiday home. Can Lucy Alexander deliver their dream?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Fish and chip shop owners Andy and Caroline Carter have recently inherited some money and their dream of buying a holiday home in Florida, close to Orlando, has become a reality. Ben Hillman shows them what their £130,000 budget can buy.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Stoke-on-Trent, the first to host is self-proclaimed princess Tracey Durrant. Traceys approach to cooking is simple: only use the finest ingredients and the prep has to be quick to leave more time to pamper herself and her two pet dogs Rococo and Mochino, but will Traceys attitude lose her precious points?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the second day of the competition in Stoke on Trent and the host is police woman Claire Crank, who is insisting on no airs and graces, just good food for her dinner party. Tracey says she only likes the best quality beef and even before shes arrived at the dinner party shes refusing to try Claires meat.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the third day of the competition in Stoke-on-Trent and the evenings host is recruitment manager and lad-about-town Rob McNamara. Despite rarely cooking and never having hosted a dinner party before, Robs positive hes in with a chance of winning that £1,000 cash prize.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Beauty parlour owner Michelle Minter hopes her gourmet menu will impress her guests, but after last nights argument over Traceys picky behaviour, everyone is treading on egg shells. However, theres good news: Traceys trapped in gridlock on the M6 and theyll have to start dinner without her! Cue a total change in atmosphere.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The final dinner party from Stoke-on-Trent is hosted by city councillor Matt Wilcox. Matt has travelled the world and eaten in some of the best restaurants, so he feels fully qualified to offer a menu with the wow factor. He wants to inspire thought and wonderment through his food, so his menu starts with a bucket of bones! Next is his spicy twist on a local stew, Caribbean lobby, and topping it all off is Stoke Mess.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Kay and Barry have decided its time to fulfil their dream of buying a holiday home in the historic city of Jerez in Spain. Can Jasmine Harman find their perfect place for their £105k?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: Educating Yorkshire
programme.desc: This documentary takes viewers inside the doors of Thornhill Community Academy near Dewsbury, highlighting what happens in the secondary school. Through highlighting the diverse institution, almost exactly half White British and half British-Asian, `Educating Yorkshire provides an insight into modern school life in the UK as it follows head teacher Jonny Mitchell, who tries to build upon recent improvements in exam results among the schools students. The programme also explores the universal themes of teenage life and the student-teacher relationships that are important in a young persons formative years.

programme.title: Black and White in Colour
programme.desc: Documentary by Isaac Julien, first broadcast in 1992, that traces and questions the progress made by black and Asian people on British television. Sitcoms such as `Till Death Us Do Part gave work to black actors.

programme.title: The Riviera: A History in Pictures
programme.desc: As transatlantic liners brought Americas super-rich to the region, art and celebrity became integrally intertwined as cultural gurus and multi-millionaires all partied on the beach. programme.title: The Moment of Proof
programme.desc: A man is conclusively linked to a series of murders at music venues by a shoelace with traces of his final victims DNA on it. After two people are set upon at a music festival by attackers with the same description, police are in a race against time to find their man, but then a third assault at a nightclub leaves them a vital clue. Also today, coded information buried within a spreadsheet reveals the man responsible for a campaign of hacking and blackmailing that targeted businesses.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Jacqui visits Broadstairs in Kent, a favourite holiday destination of Charles Dickens, to see a two-bedroom basement garden flat bought by an experienced developer. Martin returns to Burton-on-Trent in Staffordshire to revisit a fire-damaged two-bed terrace he first saw in 2021, and he also heads to Tonypandy in south Wales to visit a four-storey building with potential to convert into separate flats.

programme.title: WA World Championship Athletics LIVE
programme.desc: Coverage continues on day three of the World Athletics Championships in Tokyo, with the focus turning to Mondo Duplantis in the final of the mens pole vault. Hes already broken his own world record three times this season, and hes aiming for a third world title in Japan. The mens sprint hurdlers begin their campaigns for gold as well in the heats of the 110m hurdles. Can the USAs Grant Holloway defend his title despite a tricky season so far?

programme.title: WA World Athletics Championships
programme.desc: Pole vault superstar Mondo Duplantis is the one to watch on day 3 of the World Athletics Championships in Tokyo. Sarah Mulkerrins has all the highlights from the Japanese capital, including the mens 3,000m steeplechase and womens 100m hurdles finals. Josh Kerr is also in action as he aims to defend his 1,500m world title, but hell have to get through the semi-finals first. And could Emile Cairess from Leeds become the first British man to win a world medal in the marathon?

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Featuring the rather eccentric Georgian philosopher Jeremy Bentham and later super-rich Roman politician Crassus raps about his blinging lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy, Richard and James attempt to save the planet by building their own electric car, and then put their latest `green creation through the rigours of the new car testing process. Meanwhile on the track, Europe takes on the USA in the battle of the continents, as Jeremy pits the Corvette ZR1s muscle against the finesse of Audis R8 V10. The Star in a Reasonably Priced Car is Michael Sheen.

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: After being invited to a bar crawl on Khaosan Road, Zara gets under the skin of Bangkoks notorious red light district, Soi Cowboy - but filming is swiftly shut down by local bar owners and the police. When Zara meets Mike Yu, a young British expat living a life of luxury in the Thai capital, she realises theres more to the city than meets the eye. Meanwhile, a visit to the Bangkok Immigration Detention Centre exposes how easy it is to get caught on the wrong side of the law in Thailand.

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on a journey across Essex. He heads to the ancient woodland of Epping Forest and learns of Audley End Houses role as a secret wartime military school.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.desc: JB stumbles upon a rare and valuable book collection, and JJ restores a treasured washstand. But one wrong blow with a hammer could damage a cherished piece beyond repair.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The roadshow travels to Beaumaris Castle on the island of Anglesey, north Wales, where jewellery expert Joanna Hardy is dazzled by a rare ruby and diamond collection worn by a family for generations of weddings. Lisa Lloyd is fascinated by a wooden figurine hidden in a secret cupboard and identifies it as a ceremonial African puppet. Ben Rogers Jones sees a collection of photographs and ephemera relating to one of Waless most important historical figures, Prime Minister David Lloyd George.

programme.title: Match of the Day
programme.desc: Kelly Cates presents highlights from both of Sundays Premier League games, including an early-season Manchester derby. Liverpool look to maintain their 100 per cent record when they take on Burnley at Turf Moor, and there are some crackers to choose from in Augusts Goal of the Month.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: WA World Championship Athletics LIVE
programme.desc: There are four world titles on offer on day three of the World Athletics Championships in Tokyo, but all eyes will be on Mondo Duplantis. The Olympic champion has already broken his own world record this season - can he do it again in the National Stadium and claim a third world title? 400m hurdle world record holder Karsten Warholm is also in action in the heats.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

programme.title: WA World Championship Athletics LIVE
programme.desc: Day three of the World Athletics Championships draws to a close as Josh Kerr continues the defence of his 1500m crown. First, though, he has to get through the semi-finals. The mens pole vault concludes, and can world record holder Mondo Duplantis claim a third consecutive world title? Theres also coverage of the mens 300m steeplechase final, and the womens 100m hurdles champion is also crowned.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British
programme.desc: Dave Myers and Si King explore the amazing food available in our British Waterways. With their unique banter and camaraderie, the duo try their hand at fly fishing for trout, create a sumptuous stuffed wild duck and find out about how the Gloucestershire tradition of eating baby eels has effectively died out.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: London and the South East England: Judging
programme.desc: The two highest scoring chefs from London and south east England must go head-to-head and cook their six-course menus again.

programme.title: Cornwall: This Fishing Life
programme.desc: Cadgwith Cove is Cornwalls last traditional full-time fishing cove. As boats got bigger, fish stocks declined and young men left, many of Cornwalls other coves faded away. Despite this, Cadgwith has held strong.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Antique experts Catherine Southon and David Fletcher find objects to take off to auction. Catherine uncovers a large collection of glassware and stoneware which had been dug up in the north east of England and David finds an American money box in the shape of a bulldog.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Every day this week, former winners Tim Key, Jamie Laing, Sunetra Sarker and Laura Whitmore take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

programme.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo sets off on a new railway adventure to explore the twin shores of the English Channel and the estuaries of the Thames and Medway. At Cuckmere Haven, he enjoys astonishing views of the gleaming white Seven Sisters.

programme.title: Global Eye
programme.desc: Jean Mackenzie reports on the political turmoil in South Korea following the short-lived declaration of martial law last year.

programme.title: Mastermind
programme.desc: Clive Myrie presents another heat of the classic quiz. The specialist subjects are the history of Coventry, the BBC comedy series `People Just Do Nothing, the Roman emperor Nero, and the life of the sportsman CB Fry.

programme.title: Only Connect
programme.desc: Victoria Coren Mitchell hosts the quiz. Two teams who lost their first-round match return, and only one of them can go through to the next round. They face such questions as, what is the connection between dis-moi, the royal, Nintendo, and pee-?

programme.title: University Challenge
programme.desc: The first round of the competition continues. Trinity Hall, Cambridge, and the London School of Economics are the teams facing their first starters for ten. Amol Rajan asks the questions.

programme.title: Twiggy
programme.desc: A portrait of International supermodel, actor, singer and iconic British figure, Twiggy.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: The Big Cases
programme.sub-title: The Aristocrat, the Convict and the Missing Baby
programme.desc: An aristocrat and her convict partner go on the run with their newborn baby. The search ends in heartbreak. Family, friends, and witnesses reveal the background to this extraordinary case.

programme.title: Bram Stokers Dracula
programme.desc: Retelling of the classic horror tale about Count Dracula, a 15th-century prince who is condemned to live off the blood of the living for eternity. Young lawyer Jonathan Harker is sent to Draculas castle to finalise a land deal, but when the Count sees a photo of Harkers fiancee, Mina, the image of his dead wife, he imprisons him and sets off for London to track her down.

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Matt Baker and Sammi Kinghorn trace the pawprints of a river legend - Tarka the Otter, to explore how the people of North Devon have helped the Eurasian otter claw back from near-extinction.

As the children start their day, they are thinking of new ideas to be super-kind. Jessica and Orla draw lovely pictures for the teachers, which makes Mrs Farrell and Miss Gerrard feel happy. At lunchtime Solomon is finding the lid on his yogurt a bit tricky, so Sam helps him to open it!

She visits a gigantic tomato growing farm and uses her special time-lapse camera to discover how a plant germinates from a seed and grows into a shoot. Next, she travels in a lift to the top of the high greenhouse to see the flowers and tomato fruits growing. We learn how the plant needs water, sunlight and carbon dioxide to make its own energy to grow.

programme.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts the show in which thousands of pounds are at stake. All that stands between Soozie, Guy, Owen and Marie is the small matter of one of the countrys finest quiz brains.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as four strangers - Alan, Lynn, Kareem and Sally - come together in the hope that as a team they can take on the Chaser and leave with thousands of pounds.

programme.title: The Donald Trump Show

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: In spite of being obscenely rich, Mr Burns can never be truly happy without his childhood teddy bear, Bobo, who Bart finds in a bag of ice and gives to Maggie. Homer spots a chance to ingratiate himself with his boss, but can he upset his daughter to do it?

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge and her new neighbour have a girls night out and end up on the wrong side of the law.

programme.title: The King of Queens

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: At the amusement park, Arthur and Deacon have a scam going with a wheelchair, Danny and Spence hunt for girls, and Doug lies to Carrie so he can go on the rollercoaster, but his lies come back to haunt him.

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug and Deacon start hanging out with each others wives when they find out they have more in common with them than with their own wives. While Deacon and Carrie are getting on well, Deacons wife Kelly starts to get bored with Doug.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray and Debra have an argument about their new can opener, and Marie, Frank and Robert cant help getting involved.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray and Debra try to decide who should care for their children in case anything should happen to them.

programme.title: Frasier

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier finds himself attracted to the station manager during labour negotiations.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: The Adventures of Bad Boy and Dirty Girl
programme.desc: Kate and Frasier are worried about the consequences of their fling, but like grown adults they sit down in the studio to discuss matters. One thing leads to another and only then do they realise they have left the mic on transmit.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: The Last Time I Saw Maris

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Channel 4s midday news summary.

programme.desc: In Spain, a Lancashire family gets the keys to their new beachside bar. In France, a Manchester couple snaps up a complex of holiday lets. And two Yorkshire restaurateurs bring a taste of the north to rural Portugal.

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz travel to Stroud in Gloucestershire to take on a 1973 Hillman Imp which has been abandoned for decades. The car belongs to former NHS nurse Margaret and was her pride and joy until it started to need a lot of work to keep it on the road.

programme.title: Countdown

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: Karen and Steve begin their mission to rescue a French settlement with royal connections. And Andrew and Katja are still battling to save their Italian settlement.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: This weeks competition kicks off in North Yorkshire, where hosts Kerrie and Vickie hope the cosy vibes of their countryside pub will be a hit.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The first host in Bolton, glamorous mum and teacher Katie, hopes to charm her guests with an evening of beauty revelations, cocktail-shaking and hearty homemade food. With Bolton favourites on the menu along with Irish history, Katies going all out.

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: In Alicante, David and Jane want a holiday home close to all the bars and restaurants. In Almería, the Garner guys tackle one of Spains most popular pastimes: fishing.

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Includes sport and weather.

programme.title: Jamie: Eat Yourself Healthy
programme.desc: Jamie celebrates heart-health promoting ingredients, as he makes a nutritious steak dinner and vibrant green orecchiette pasta, before whipping up some gnarly gut-friendly oaty balls.

programme.title: The Inheritance
programme.desc: Devious new game with Elizabeth Hurley and Robert Rinder. With the fallout from last night weighing heavy, the players go on a bear hunt. But theres a shocking twist in store.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Nice guy Matteo meets goal-oriented Sam, who mentions babies before theyve even ordered dinner. Theres also a tree hugger, a chef and a wedding singer seeking their match.

programme.title: Educating Yorkshire
programme.desc: This documentary takes viewers inside the doors of Thornhill Community Academy near Dewsbury, highlighting what happens in the secondary school. Through highlighting the diverse institution, almost exactly half White British and half British-Asian, `Educating Yorkshire provides an insight into modern school life in the UK as it follows head teacher Jonny Mitchell, who tries to build upon recent improvements in exam results among the schools students. The programme also explores the universal themes of teenage life and the student-teacher relationships that are important in a young persons formative years.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off: An Extra Slice
programme.desc: Stephen Mangan joins Jo Brand and Tom Allen to digest all the drama from Biscuit Week. Whose crunch packed a punch, and who had a soggy setback?

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: Greg Davies and Alex Horne return as Ania Magliano, Maisie Adam, Phil Ellis, Reece Shearsmith and Sanjeev Bhaskar deem themselves brave enough to compete for the coveted trophy: Gregs golden head.

programme.title: Mitchell and Webb Are Not Helping
programme.desc: Mitchell and Webbs inventive and very sweary sketch show continues. This time: TVs shallowest game show, the worlds scariest film and mobile phone etiquette while doing a murder.

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 Hours in...
programme.desc: Joe Lycett and Roisin Conaty visit the fairy-tale city of Salzburg, where they enjoy a three-course meal on horse and carriage tour, some forest-bathing, and a spot of musical cycling.

programme.sub-title: The One With All the Resolutions
programme.desc: The friends make their New Year resolutions, and Joey tries to arrange for Chandler to kiss Monica at midnight at a New Years Eve party.

programme.sub-title: The One Where Everybody Finds Out
programme.desc: Chandler and Monicas relationship becomes less of a secret, and Ross must prove to his boss that hes sane in order to return to work.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Alistair Appleton helps a house-hunting couple find a country home with their £700,000 budget and get back to nature in Buckinghamshire. While in the area, Alistair visits an entrepreneurial snail farm which produces high-end snail caviar.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew heads to a huge antiques wholesaler in Exeter, where he finds pile upon pile of affordable gems. Next, its on to north London, to visit an emporium of curiosities.

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: In Somerset, Sarah Moore explores Keynsham Recycling Centre, determined to save quality items from hitting the skips. A concoction of car parts are earmarked for blacksmith Kev Paxton, designer Sarah Peterson works on an abandoned upholstery project, and Sarah repurposes some old barrel rings before trying to sell the items on for a profit.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiquers Natasha Raskin Sharp and Steven Moore begin a Road Trip adventure, motoring through North Yorkshire and Tyne and Wear in grand style behind the wheel of a 1960s Rolls Royce. Steven flushes out a bargain while visiting the loo in one antiques shop, finding some 18th-century tea bowls hidden away by the toilet. A break from shopping sees Steven set sail to South Shields and learn about the incredible restoration of a quite remarkable lifeboat.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Auctioneer Natasha Raskin Sharp and ceramics expert Steven Moore are on a whistle-stop tour of Tyne and Wear before wandering north to Northumberland. Natasha wastes little time in the antiques shops, gambling her kitty like an 18th-century taverngoer buying some George III period gaming tokens. She ditches the 1960s Rolls Royce and sets off on a very unlikely safari to catch sight of an ancient creature that still roams the Northumberland plains.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Angus helps Amanda and Steve clear their late parents home in Huddersfield thats full to brimming with memories and treasured things.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House

programme.desc: Shaun asks Angus to clear his late fathers home. Its packed with unusual items from East Asia, but some forgotten toys are the stars at auction.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Escape to the Country

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew heads to Devon, where he finds a wealth of unusual oddities housed in a country pub. Next, its on to Hastings, which has enjoyed a recent resurgence in the antiques trade.

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: In the West Midlands, Jacqui Joseph scours Walsall Recycling Centre for quality items. Her mission is to save three things, have them transformed or revitalised and try to sell them for a profit. She has her sights set on a chest of drawers, theres a much-loved set of six dining chairs for upholsterer Leigh-Anne Treadwell to work on, and signwriter Joel Poole works his magic on a mid-century cabinet.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques experts Natasha Raskin Sharp and Steven Moore point their 1960s Rolls Royce north and to the Scottish Borders before heading on to Edinburgh for another auction. Natasha wastes little time when shopping, enchanted by a tobacco barrel manufactured by a quality maker. She also decides to buy a travel case, but only after she discovers the velvet-lined secret compartment it hides within.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: With a swirl of tartan and a burst of the bagpipes, our Scottish tour continues in Fife with antiques experts Natasha Raskin Sharp and Steven Moore. The 1960s Rolls Royce glides the pair through countryside and town as they head from the east coast to central Scotland. Natashas money reserves are dwindling, so she cautiously settles on a bargain piece of Scottish studio pottery. However, a canny buy of an arts and crafts-style lantern pays dividends at the auction in Hamilton.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: A huge haul of silver leaves Angus speechless and raises a staggering amount at auction. Later, Angus helps Susan clear a huge collection of railwayana.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Scotlands Roo Irvine and Steven Moore from Newcastle search for antiques in Yorkshire. Expect flat caps, pork pies and some Chinese porcelain that earns one expert a great profit.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Experts Steven Moore and Roo Irvine cruise around lovely Lancashire. Theres great expectation for a Charles Dickens find, but the most auction excitement is for a tribal paddle.

programme.title: Long Lost Family: What Happened Next
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell revisit some of the families that have been reunited. To explore the challenging, unexpected and emotional developments as new relationships are built.

programme.title: Long Lost Family: What Happened Next
programme.desc: We catch up with two families who have been transformed in ways they could never have imagined. When 55-year-old Julie Roberts happily reunited with her birth mother Marion Quigley last year, she unravelled a difficult family history which sparked an extraordinary chain of events. Now Marion wants to track down her two other children who were also taken into care. In our second story, we catch up with 28-year-old Christina Barlow who found her birth mother in Colombia.

programme.title: Long Lost Family: What Happened Next
programme.desc: Follows three stories of siblings brought together after decades apart. The first story catches up John Nicklin, who spent the first 68 years of his life believing he had no biological family. We tracked him down to Australia and introduced him to four siblings on his birth mothers side. Here, we watch these relationships develop and there is an unusual twist as John goes on to uncover secrets on his fathers side of his family, leading to a whole new reunion.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: The team are called in by Alison, whose 18th century farmhouse is haunted by a young child and another sinister entity who they think caused their pets to become seriously ill. After investigating, a heart wrenching revelation affects the team.

The professional gunmen train the villagers to defend themselves, then plan a trap for the evil Calvera.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: When a feared contract killer refuses to murder a young blind woman on the orders of her handler, she finds herself hunted by old colleagues and a determined detective.

programme.title: Shrapnel
programme.desc: A former Marine and his war buddy face off against the Mexican cartel after his daughter disappears.

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: Snatched from the Green Place of Many Mothers, young Furiosa gets caught in the crossfire of two tyrannical warlords. As the tyrants fight for dominance, Furiosa soon finds herself in a nonstop battle to make her way home.

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: Ace assassin Arthur Bishop becomes a target when he agrees to teach reckless Steve the art of contract killing.

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: In the year 2012, scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal. Only one man survives, virologist Robert Neville. He has two aims: find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A widowed farmer, with a brave but brutal military past, decides not to join up when the British arrive in 1776. programme.desc: A huntsman and a fellow warrior help an ice queen battle the evil sister who betrayed her.

programme.title: The Swan Princess
programme.desc: A beautiful princess falls in love with a prince from another land, but an exiled magician who wants her for himself conjures up a spell to transform her into a swan. Forced to embark on a dangerous quest to reverse the magic, the princess is helped along by some new-found animal friends.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: Rugrats Go Wild
programme.desc: The children and their bickering family are stranded on a desert island. Fortunately help is at hand from the Thornberry family, who are visiting the island to film a rare snow leopard. Once again, animal-understanding Eliza saves the day.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 4
programme.desc: When a powerful shape-shifting sorceress sets her eyes on Pos Staff of Wisdom, he suddenly realises hes going to need some help. Teaming up with a quick-witted corsac fox, he soon discovers that heroes can be found in the most unexpected places.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Mavis surprises Dracula with plans for a fun-filled summer voyage on a monster cruise. As the pack starts enjoying colossal buffets and exotic excursions, Drac finds himself falling for the ships intriguing but dangerous captain. He soon learns that trying to balance family, friends and romance might just be too much to handle. even for the worlds most powerful vampire.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A young Viking with aspirations of becoming a dragon hunter befriends a young dragon himself and learns more about the creatures than he ever assumed.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A pig, a mouse, a porcupine, a gorilla, an elephant and other animals gather at a koalas theatre for a singing competition.

programme.title: Monster House
programme.desc: Young DJ and his pals set out to discover what bloodcurdling secrets lie behind the front door of the scary house across the street. When the house comes alive and starts eating people, have the kids bitten off more than they can chew?

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: Stranded in the wilderness, a mule deer and a domesticated bear try to make their way back to the safety of a town preserve before a hunter catches them.

programme.title: The Inventor
programme.desc: The insatiably curious Leonardo da Vinci leaves Italy to join the French court, where he can experiment freely, invent incredible machines and study the human body. He is joined on his adventure by the audacious French princess Marguerite de Nevarre.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: Home Delivery

programme.title: Coming 2 America
programme.desc: Needing a male heir to the throne, Prince Akeem returns to Queens, N.Y., to find his long-lost son and bring him back to Zamunda.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Now graduating seniors, the Barden Bellas enter an international a cappella competition which no American team has ever won.

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: The story of a pair of blues musicians who try to raise the money to save an orphanage by reuniting their old band - nearly writing off Chicago in the process.

programme.title: Borat Subsequent Moviefilm
programme.desc: Released from prison for bringing shame to his country, Kazakh funnyman Borat risks life and limb when he returns to America with his 15-year-old daughter.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydias life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuices name three times, the mischievous demon soon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Now graduating seniors, the Barden Bellas enter an international a cappella competition which no American team has ever won.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: Anyone but You
programme.desc: Despite having an amazing first date, Bea and Bens initial attraction quickly turns sour. When they unexpectedly find themselves at a destination wedding in Australia, the pair pretend to be the perfect couple to keep up appearances.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: When Death arrives on Earth to take a media tycoon to Heaven, his experiences of life as a mortal lead to him falling in love with the doomed mans daughter. Taking the form of a mysterious stranger, Death strikes a deal with the business mogul which allows each of them to spend more time on Earth, but when Deaths handsome form attracts the attention of his victims daughter, the ensuing romance is complicated for all.

programme.title: Boy Meets Boy
programme.desc: Harry has been partying for 48 hours when he meets Johannes on the dance floor of a club in Berlin. With 15 hours until his flight home, Johannes offers to help him print his boarding pass.

programme.title: El Dorado
programme.desc: Gunslinger Cole Thornton rides into a small town to work for a cattle baron, but quits after learning that his would-be employer wants to drive a family off their land and obtain their water supply. Thornton leaves the situation unresolved, but a chance encounter takes him back to El Dorado, where he joins the sheriff in a range war.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Valentines Day
programme.desc: Following a group of Los Angeles residents who try to find their way through the highs and lows of love during a single day.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Roxy Hart is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover. In prison she meets tabloid darling and headline singer, Velma Kelly, who is also in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A Brooklyn disco dancer develops doubts about his lifestyle when he teams up with an ambitious woman for a big contest.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit and his three sisters -- Flopsy, Mopsy and Cotton-Tail -- enjoy spending their days in Mr. McGregors vegetable garden. When one of McGregors relatives suddenly moves in, hes less than thrilled to discover a family of rabbits in his new home. A battle of wills soon breaks out as the new owner hatches scheme after scheme to get rid of Peter -- a resourceful rabbit who proves to be a worthy and wily opponent.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: A spiritualist medium holds a seance for a writer suffering from writers block but accidentally summons the spirit of his deceased first wife which leads to an increasingly complex love triangle with his current wife of five years.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Inside his book, Harold can make anything come to life simply by drawing it. After he grows up and draws himself off the books pages and into the real world, he learns his trusty crayon can set off more hilarious hijinks than he thought possible.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Cats and Dogs
programme.desc: Unknown to humans, all-out war between cats and dogs has raged since the beginning of time. Now the cats face defeat if scientist Professor Brody can perfect a formula that will make all humans non-allergic to dogs. The cats leader, Mr Tinkles, plans to steal the serum, but first he must get past fearless dog agent Lou who, thanks to a mistake in recruitment, guards the Brody family.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything theyve faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A group of talking dogs save the Youth World Cup football finals.

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: WWII evacuee David hates the Germans, but now his life has been saved by one. What is the right thing to do, tell the Army or offer his help?

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: WWII evacuee David hates the Germans, but now his life has been saved by one. What is the right thing to do, tell the Army or offer his help?

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit and his three sisters -- Flopsy, Mopsy and Cotton-Tail -- enjoy spending their days in Mr. McGregors vegetable garden. When one of McGregors relatives suddenly moves in, hes less than thrilled to discover a family of rabbits in his new home. A battle of wills soon breaks out as the new owner hatches scheme after scheme to get rid of Peter -- a resourceful rabbit who proves to be a worthy and wily opponent.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: A spiritualist medium holds a seance for a writer suffering from writers block but accidentally summons the spirit of his deceased first wife which leads to an increasingly complex love triangle with his current wife of five years.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Inside his book, Harold can make anything come to life simply by drawing it. After he grows up and draws himself off the books pages and into the real world, he learns his trusty crayon can set off more hilarious hijinks than he thought possible.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Cats and Dogs
programme.desc: Unknown to humans, all-out war between cats and dogs has raged since the beginning of time. Now the cats face defeat if scientist Professor Brody can perfect a formula that will make all humans non-allergic to dogs. The cats leader, Mr Tinkles, plans to steal the serum, but first he must get past fearless dog agent Lou who, thanks to a mistake in recruitment, guards the Brody family.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything theyve faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: Friend or Foe

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hairs-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old mans notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a group of Allied POWs who engineered a bold escape from a Nazi camp during World War II. The escape committees plan is to liberate hundreds of inmates and cause havoc throughout occupied territory, but their problems include concealing three tunnels from the guards and disposing of numerous tons of soil.

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: While visiting London with his family, Jack Ryan foils an IRA attempt to assassinate a government minister, killing one of the attackers in the process. Swearing vengeance, the IRAs Sean Miller follows Ryan and his family to their seaside home in America where he and his followers plan to exact their revenge.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A Brooklyn disco dancer develops doubts about his lifestyle when he teams up with an ambitious woman for a big contest.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A Brooklyn disco dancer develops doubts about his lifestyle when he teams up with an ambitious woman for a big contest.

programme.title: Please Dont Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Three deadbeat co-workers fend off hairless bears, desperate park rangers and a hypocritical cult leader while searching for a priceless treasure.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Armys New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Spoof spy caper with the eponymous, blundering hero attempting to recover the crown jewels and save Britain from an evil mastermind when all the other agents are killed. Promoted from lowly pen pusher to super spy, Johnny English is baffled when clues lead to respected entrepreneur Pascal Sauvage, but could the enigmatic Lorna hold the key to the mystery?

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A haphazard spy returns to MI-7 after years in a Tibetan monastery honing his zen skills. Armed with gizmos, gadgets and chaotic luck he takes on a global ring of assassins.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A leaving party for New Yorker Rob Hawkins is rudely interrupted by the arrival of an unwelcome guest, something that has a penchant for smashing up skyscrapers, playing football with the Statue of Libertys head and handpicking humans as snacks.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie is given another makeover to become the face of the Bureau, prior to embarking on a promotional tour. When two of her friends are kidnapped - Miss USA and a beauty pageant director - she decides to investigate on her own, in defiance of orders to the contrary.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: A car crash leaves a playboy maimed and charged with murder in this remake of the mind-bending film `Abre los Ojos.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his familys killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: John Thornton is an Irish-American boxer who, after a professional tragedy, returns to Ireland to retire. There, he meets and falls for the fiery Mary Kate Danaher, much to the disgust of her brother Squire Will Danaher.

programme.desc: After responding to an emergency call from a mysterious woman, a young locksmith gets unwittingly caught in the crosshairs of a ruthless mob boss.

programme.desc: Danny, an ex-soldier homeless in Dublin, meets Will, a teen fleeing a drug gang. Their encounter forces them to confront their pasts while navigating the harsh realities they face.

programme.title: The Surfer
programme.desc: A man revisits his childhood beach to surf with his son. Humiliated by locals, he becomes entangled in an escalating conflict that pushes him to his limits.

programme.desc: A sudden attack by Wulf, a ruthless Dunlending lord, forces Helm Hammerhand and his people to make a daring last stand in the ancient stronghold of the Hornburg. Finding herself in a desperate situation, Helms daughter must lead the resistance.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force thats far beyond her control.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Haunting of the Queen Mary
programme.desc: Mysterious and violent incidents occur during a familys 1938 cruise aboard the RMS Queen Mary. These events strangely connect to another familys fate on the same ocean liner in the present.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: If You Were the Last
programme.desc: Adrift in their broken-down space shuttle with little hope of rescue, two astronauts debate whether theyre better off as friends or something more.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Timestalker
programme.desc: Hapless Agnes repeatedly falls for the wrong guy, dies a grim death, and is reincarnated a century later. As she experiences romantic misfortune through different eras of history, Agnes seeks to avoid repeat mistakes and finally break the cycle.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Lovely, Dark, and Deep
programme.desc: A new back-country ranger travels alone through the dangerous wilderness, hoping to uncover the origins of a tragedy that has haunted her since she was a child.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: If You Were the Last
programme.desc: Adrift in their broken-down space shuttle with little hope of rescue, two astronauts debate whether theyre better off as friends or something more.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he must prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Insidious
programme.desc: Parents take drastic measures when it seems their new home is haunted and their comatose son is possessed by a malevolent entity.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Haunting of the Queen Mary
programme.desc: Mysterious and violent incidents occur during a familys 1938 cruise aboard the RMS Queen Mary. These events strangely connect to another familys fate on the same ocean liner in the present.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: If You Were the Last
programme.desc: Adrift in their broken-down space shuttle with little hope of rescue, two astronauts debate whether theyre better off as friends or something more.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Timestalker
programme.desc: Hapless Agnes repeatedly falls for the wrong guy, dies a grim death, and is reincarnated a century later. As she experiences romantic misfortune through different eras of history, Agnes seeks to avoid repeat mistakes and finally break the cycle.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Lovely, Dark, and Deep
programme.desc: A new back-country ranger travels alone through the dangerous wilderness, hoping to uncover the origins of a tragedy that has haunted her since she was a child.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: If You Were the Last
programme.desc: Adrift in their broken-down space shuttle with little hope of rescue, two astronauts debate whether theyre better off as friends or something more.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he must prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Insidious
programme.desc: Parents take drastic measures when it seems their new home is haunted and their comatose son is possessed by a malevolent entity.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Angels and Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is surprised to be approached by the Popes emissaries for help. Following the Popes recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiffs place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: Seven Psychopaths
programme.desc: A struggling screenwriter finds himself inadvertently entangled in the criminal underworld when his knucklehead friends abduct a mobsters beloved Shih Tzu.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: A huntsman and a fellow warrior help an ice queen battle the evil sister who betrayed her.

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek Gen. Themistocles leads the charge to fight invading Persian forces led by the god Xerxes -- once a mortal -- and Artemisia.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: The Woman in Black
programme.desc: A widowed lawyer encounters ghostly goings-on at the foreboding estate of a recently deceased client.

programme.title: The Woman in Black 2: Angel of Death
programme.desc: 40 years after Eel Marsh Houses first haunting, a group of children and a schoolteacher take refuge at the house, escaping from WWII London. There they will awaken the houses darkest inhabitant.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the worlds population.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the worlds population.

programme.title: Sew Torn
programme.desc: A seamstress gets tangled in her own thread after stealing a briefcase from a drug deal gone bad. In an escalating game of cat and mouse, her different choices lead to drastically different outcomes along the way.

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: While visiting London with his family, Jack Ryan foils an IRA attempt to assassinate a government minister, killing one of the attackers in the process. Swearing vengeance, the IRAs Sean Miller follows Ryan and his family to their seaside home in America where he and his followers plan to exact their revenge.

programme.title: Rashomon
programme.desc: A heavy downpour surprises a priest, a woodcutter and a servant. They seek protection from the water in a temple ruin. Previously, they witnessed a crime without knowing how the crime was committed.

programme.title: Melancholia
programme.desc: A German ex-pat living in London is confronted by his past when hes asked to assassinate a Chilean murderer who is visiting London.

programme.title: Detroit
programme.desc: As rioting and civil unrest rocks Detroit during the summer of 1967, several policemen begin interrogating guests at the Algiers Motel. By the end of the night, three unarmed men are gunned down while several others are brutally beaten.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if hell live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Rashomon
programme.desc: A heavy downpour surprises a priest, a woodcutter and a servant. They seek protection from the water in a temple ruin. Previously, they witnessed a crime without knowing how the crime was committed.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: Small-time crooks One Two and Mumbles decide to legitimately invest in some prime real estate and find themselves out of their depth and in debt to old-school London gangster Lenny Cole. Cole himself is in the middle of a business deal with a Russian gangster, but when his accountant tips off One Two and Mumbles to the details of an upcoming big-money business transaction, the two scallywags swoop in and steal the cash.

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: Thriller adapted from Thomas Harriss first Hannibal Lecter novel about an FBI profiler called out of retirement to help catch a serial killer nicknamed the Tooth Fairy. The agent has the uncanny ability to project himself into the minds of his criminal prey, but the case forces him to confront his past and consult his former nemesis - the now-incarcerated Dr Hannibal Lecter.

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: An ex-hit man is injected with a mysterious cocktail of drugs by his arch-rival that will kill him if his heart rate drops below a certain level. Hurtling through a succession of sex and violence in order to keep his pulse rate up, he must seek revenge and keep himself and his girlfriend alive.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: A car crash leaves a playboy maimed and charged with murder in this remake of the mind-bending film `Abre los Ojos.

programme.title: The Line
programme.desc: A university student lives life without fear of consequences.

programme.title: Melancholia
programme.desc: A German ex-pat living in London is confronted by his past when hes asked to assassinate a Chilean murderer who is visiting London.

programme.title: Eileen
programme.desc: In 1964 Massachusetts, a young secretary becomes enchanted by Rebecca, the glamorous new counsellor at the prison where she works. Their budding friendship soon takes a twisted turn when Rebecca reveals a dark secret.

programme.title: Dangerous Waters
programme.desc: A young woman, her new boyfriend and her single mother embark on a sailing adventure to Bermuda. However, when criminals suddenly attack their boat, the pleasure trip turns into a desperate fight for survival and a quest for vengeance.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Based on a real-life incident. The commander of Russias first nuclear submarine and his executive officers first test voyage ends in disaster when the reactor fails. The only hope is for the crew to repair it at the risk of fatal irradiation, but the two men also have very different political agendas, one of which could trigger global conflict rather than maintain the uneasy truce of the Cold War.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: Seafaring drama based on the true story of a commercial fishing boat crew who become caught in a terrifying storm off the coast of Massachusetts. In the autumn of 1991, a fishing boat captain is determined to set sail despite the adverse weather conditions, but when the ice machine breaks down his decision to brave the storm rather than lose his catch results in a battle against 100ft waves.

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: A violent and uncompromising police officer hunts for a psychopath who holds the city of San Francisco to ransom. Although the officers unorthodox methods do not endear him to his superiors, the mayor reluctantly agrees that Harry Callahan seems to be the right cop for the job.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.desc: After a small-town man is found shot to death at a Missouri roadside park, the evidence trail leads detectives further into the mans complicated past where they uncover a wicked plot that no one saw coming.

programme.title: Man on Wire
programme.desc: On August 7th 1974, at 7.15am, 24-year-old Frenchman Philippe Petit stepped off the edge of the South Tower of New Yorks World Trade Centre. Armed only with a balancing pole and intense determination, he walked out onto a single suspended wire and `danced for 45 minutes while balancing a quarter of a mile above the pavement below. The is the intimate story of Petit and his group of friends as they followed their dream.

programme.title: The Last Movie Stars
programme.sub-title: Chapter Six: Luck Is an Art
programme.desc: In the wake of their sons death, Joanne enters a career renaissance while Paul dives deeper into the high-stakes world of car racing; the couple find solace in charitable work through their company Newmans Own and enter their twilight years.

programme.title: Barclays Premier League Legends
programme.desc: A profile of former Liverpool player Jamie Carragher. The defender spent his whole senior career at Anfield, winning numerous trophies including the 2005 UEFA Champions League.

programme.sub-title: Chapter 1: A Body in the Bay

programme.desc: When a trio of Elephants are orphaned in Zambia, they are rescued and transported to a purpose-build nursery. But it wont be smooth-sailing for the young Pachyderms; life lessons will be tough to imprint before they are returned to the wild.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America
programme.desc: Marvel at North Americas natural wonders as Lizzie swims through astonishing coral reefs, excavates ancient fossils, and treks through jungles on tropical shores. Observe jaguars prowling a Costa Rican beach and encounter the largest sharks.

programme.title: Beast of The Big Blue
programme.desc: Join sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls and fairy prions on New Zealands Otago Peninsula as they find mates and nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: The team works with the DEA to stop a ruthless cartel boss waging war on the streets of Los Angeles as he exacts revenge on those who killed his son.

programme.desc: Homer threatens to get rid of the dog unless it graduates from obedience school.

programme.desc: The inhabitants of an advanced planet who can no longer reproduce plan to kidnap children from the Enterprise to rebuild their race.

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: The ARC team are called after a nuclear submarine encounters an anomaly and a Liopleurodon in the sea. While Abby examines a raptor-like creature which the sub crew have brought on board, Connor looks for a way to lock the anomaly. Unfortunately, the sub is then attacked by a group of Liopleurodons - and the craft is sucked through the anomaly, getting damaged in the process.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: McKay and his sister are kidnapped on Earth by a man in need of their expertise. The rest of the Atlantis team must enlist the help of an NID agent to rescue them.

programme.title: The Ark
programme.sub-title: The Last Thing You Ever Do
programme.desc: The crew must understand their enemy better as they attempt a dangerous rescue mission.

programme.title: True Blood
programme.desc: With the creation of a synthetic substitute for blood, humans and vampires can co-exist.

programme.title: Westworld
